TitleEnglish: The Comic Artist and His Assistants
SummaryEnglish: A life description about the mangaka Aito Yuuki and his assistant Ashisu Sahoto. Aito doesn't understand the feelings of the characters in his stories so he asks Ashisu to help him. Ashisu would do anything for the work, she will even let him touch her breast so he will know how it feels like?! The Habit?! The Pervert?! Can we understand them? That's the comedy of a mangaka life.
TitleJapanese: マンガ家さんとアシスタントさんと
SummaryJapanese:
爆笑マンガ家ライフコメディー！

マンガ家の愛徒勇気とアシスタントの足須沙穂都との、平々凡々な日常生活をゆるりと描く爆笑マンガ家ライフコメディー！
Aliases: Mangaka-san to Assistant-san to The Animation

1.TitleEnglish: Ashisu's Holiday \ You Never Know Until You Try
1.TitleJapanese: 足須さんの休日 / やってみなくちゃわからない

6.TitleEnglish: The Perfect Day for a Nap \ When Assistants Snap
6.TitleJapanese: お昼寝日和 / キレたアシスタント

1.TitleEnglish: Perfecting Breasts! \ Dream Job \ Panty Wars \ Mihari Otosuna's Day Off
1.SummaryEnglish: Aito, a lowly manga artist, continually says and does things that make his assistant, Sahoto, uncomfortable in every way imaginable.
1.TitleJapanese: おっぱいを究めろ! / 夢みるお仕事 / パンツウォーズ / 音砂みはりの休日

2.TitleEnglish: A New Assistant Arrives \ That's Important \ First Time Together
2.SummaryEnglish: A new girl shows up to assist Yuuki, but there may be a problem with her. Later, Yuuki's editor tries to persuade him to alter his manga to rise in the rankings.
2.TitleJapanese: それが大事 / 新アシスタント登場 / はじめての二人

3.TitleEnglish: Porno Mag Panic \ Can I Take Care of Her? \ Dark Comet Appears!
3.SummaryEnglish: Yuuki's porno stash is found and the models look awfully similar to Sahoto. Later, after Yuuki's hamfisted attempts to take care of Sahoto, a cute temporary assistant is hired.
3.TitleJapanese: エッチ本パニック / 看病できるかな? / 黒い彗星現る

4.TitleEnglish: S & M \ Mascot Character \ Seventeen Mihari
4.SummaryEnglish: Yuuki angers Sena who takes her vengeance upon him, the group creates a new mascot that Sahoto falls in love with, and Mihari recounts the first time she met Yuuki.
4.TitleJapanese: SとM / マスコットキャラ / ブラニャー登場 / セブンティーンみはり

5.TitleEnglish: Park Shock \ Someday \ Using Close Friends for Reference
5.SummaryEnglish: Yuuki meets an unusual fan in the park, Sahoto dreams of being a professional, and our favorite mangaka uses his friends as drawing references.
5.TitleJapanese: 公園ショック / いつかは / 身近な人を参考に

6.TitleEnglish: Let's Go to a Hot Spring
6.SummaryEnglish: Yuuki decides to spend his royalty check on the girls, inviting them to a relaxing vacation to the hot springs. But as it always is with Yuuki, he has ulterior motives.

7.TitleEnglish: Little Sister Attacks! \ A Night Together \ Piggybacking the Super Assistant
7.SummaryEnglish: Sahoto's little sister visits, Yuuki's editor decides to spend the night, and the littlest super assistant lets Yuuki into her circle of trust.
7.TitleJapanese: 妹襲来 / 二人の夜 / スーパーアシスタントをおんぶ

8.TitleEnglish: Chief Editor's Check \ In the Mind of a Girl \ Going Too Far
8.SummaryEnglish: The chief editor comes to check progress, Yuuki's dream of becoming the little girl (almost) comes true, and Mihari threatens to reassign Yuuki to another editor.
8.TitleJapanese: 編集長チェック / 女の子の気持ちに / やりすぎ

9.SummaryEnglish: Hindsight is always 20/20! Mihari contemplates the small mistakes that she may have made in her youth.

10.TitleEnglish: Sena-chan's Crisis \ I'll Cheer You On! \ Rain Talk
10.SummaryEnglish: Girls in bunny suits, long walks in the rain, and elevator problems are all in a day's work for Yuuki and his lovely assistants!
10.TitleJapanese: せなちゃん危機一髪 / 応援します! / 雨トーク

11.TitleEnglish: Dreaded Change \ Do your best, Sena-chan! \ Know Yourself
11.SummaryEnglish: Mihari's altered appearance is incredibly distressing to Yuuki. Cat sitting becomes a bit of an adventure for Sena and Yuuki.
11.TitleJapanese: 恐れていた変化 / がんばれせなちゃん / 自分を知ろう

12.TitleEnglish: Progress \ End of Summer \ Panty Personality Test
12.SummaryEnglish: Sahoto hopes to make her debut with a new author award. The end of the summer has the group analyzing their true nature through particular clothing choices.
12.TitleJapanese: 前進 / 夏の終わり / パンツで分かる性格診断
